mdRecord.dcterms:title: An African Zoo. at the Cape Mount Boy's School in Liberia. In order- Mr. Sibley, Miss Wrong my traveling companion, myself, and an American missionary. The dog, snake, and monkey belonged to the missionary and I can't say I was fond of any of them
